subject: Football
Tests (Drug Use)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for two of the three Broncos suspended for violating the N.F.L.’s drug policy said they were likely to ask a state court to overturn the punishments.
snippet: Lawyers for two of the three Broncos suspended for violating the N.F.L.’s drug policy said they were likely to ask a state court to overturn the punishments.
